Episodes.Title: Blade, the Man
Episodes.Plot: Blade travels to Japan and teams up with a father/daughter pair of vampire killers.

Episodes.Title: Mad World
Episodes.Plot: Vampires work with law enforcement to kidnap southeastern-Asian women.

Episodes.Title: Vampire Hunter
Episodes.Plot: Blade reunites with Noah Van Helsing, the hunter that taught him how to kill vampires.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Childhood Days
Episodes.Plot: Blade and Makoto attempt to rescue Van Helsing in the Philippines.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Glowing Island
Episodes.Plot: Blade and Makoto invade a research facility that is home to tribe that controls vampires.

Episodes.Title: The Witch Doctor
Episodes.Plot: Blade and Makoto encounter a witch doctor in Indonesia who claims to have a cure for vampirism.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Daywalker and the Mutant
Episodes.Plot: Blade encounters Wolverine and an angry street gang when he visits Madripoor.

Episodes.Title: Apocalypse Forever
Episodes.Plot: Blade uncovers a vast military initiative in Vietnam, but he is stopped by a mysterious attacker.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Students and Master
Episodes.Plot: Blade squares off against his former classmate, the mutant assassin Kikyo Mikage; their mentor makes a surprise appearance.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Maelstrom of Lament
Episodes.Plot: Makoto puts everything on the line to rescue Blade from Deacon Frost, who is performing cruel experiments on the Daywalker to further his own ambitions.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Partners
Episodes.Plot: Blade struggles to regain control over himself while in captivity, while his allies prepare a daring rescue.

Episodes.Title: On the Dark Side
Episodes.Plot: Blade invades the vampire city to engage in his final battle with Deacon Frost.
